New Records: David Warner overtook Aaron Finch as Australia's all-time leading run-scorer in T20Is with 56 against Oman
Key Match Events: David Warner and Marcus Stoinis shone through in difficult batting conditions
Pre-Game Insights: England face added pressure after the rain in Bridgetown led to a share of the points in their opener against Scotland
Australia would love nothing more than to add to the English sense of jeopardy
Jos Buttler has Jofra Archer back to bolster the England bowling attack
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh is braced for an Ashes-style reception from England's travelling fans
Jonny Bairstow is embracing that winning feeling
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first truly heavyweight clash of this expanded T20 World Cup format comes freighted with both history and subplots
The Scotland match was the third abandonment in five suffered by England
England have a slight edge in the overall T20I head-to-head with Australia, winning 11 and losing 10
